DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-randomized , single center clinical trial ass neointimal coverage stent scaffold strut apposition SYNERGY™ ABSORB minimum 12 eligible human subject 4 month 12 month stent scaffold implantation use OCT CAS
DOC.brief_title: ENdothelial Healing Assessment With Novel Coronary tEchnology
DOC.detailed_description: All subject receive SYNERGY™ stent one block coronary artery ABSORB scaffold strut artery . All subject must 2 coronary artery stenosis 70 % .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject 20 year old old 2 . Subject legally authorize representative must provide write informed consent prior study related procedure , per site requirement . 3 . Subject must evidence myocardial ischemia ( eg stable unstable angina , silent ischemia ) suitable elective PCI 4 . Significant narrow least 70 % stenosis de novo lesion ( QCA visual estimation ) 2 different native coronary artery . 5 . Subject eligible undergo OCT CAS examination 4 month 12 month stent scaffold implantation . 6 . Subject able take dual antiplatelet therapy one year follow index procedure anticoagulant prior/during index procedure 1 . Subject acute myocardial infarction ( STEMI NSTEMI ) within 24 hour index procedure 2 . Subject know leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 30 % 3 . Subject receive hemodialysis 4 . Target vessel treat PCI within 12 month 5 . Target lesion locate within saphenous vein graft arterial graft 6 . Target lesion locate ostium 7 . Target lesion locate highly tortuous equal great 60 degree 8 . Target lesion TIMI flow 0 ( total occlusion )
